item.title: MiniMint, Federated Mints for Bitcoin scaling and privacy
item.description: podcast: https://stephanlivera.com/episode/331/ Stephan Livera: Eric, welcome to the show. Eric Sirion: Hello. Yeah. Happy to be on. Nice to meet you. Stephan Livera: Yeah. So Eric, it was great to read about your proposal and read about what’s going on with MiniMint and all this stuff. And I think it’s definitely a topic that SLP listeners will be interested to hear about, ideas related to this, privacy, scalability, all sorts of things.
